it.polimi.se2019.server.games

Class PlayerDeath

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2019.server.games.PlayerDeath

  • public class PlayerDeath
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is sent to all players by the kill shot track when one player is killed, it contains enough data so that every player that receives this update can change his score getting points for the damage did to the dead player.
    Author:
    Rodolfo Mariotti

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PlayerDeath(Player player, boolean deathDuringFrenzy)
      Constructs the main object to notify every player to update their score.

      • isDeathDuringFrenzy

        public boolean isDeathDuringFrenzy()
        Getter method for the deathDuringFrenzy attribute.
        Returns:
